definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: It used to be that much of this discontent boiled under the surface.
sentences.chinese: 在过去，许多不满情绪在社会表层下沸腾。

sentences.english: Several species of Lactobacilli contain multiple S-layer protein genes.
sentences.chinese: 一些乳酸杆菌具有多个表层蛋白基因。

sentences.english: During the cold night the puddles skimmed over.
sentences.chinese: 夜间寒冷，水洼表层上结成了冰。

sentences.english: The insect's sting penetrates the surface of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的螫针能够刺穿皮肤的表层。

sentences.english: Use of waste glass and steel slag in surface asphalt is analysed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 和钢渣在表层沥青混合料中的应用进行了分析。

sentences.english: The temperature conductivities of dune positions are much different.
sentences.chinese: 沙丘不同部位表层导温率也有很大的差别。

sentences.english: The application of ceramic membranes in the pretreatment of seawater desalinization;
sentences.chinese: 主要煤层含硫低与该区泻湖及表层海水淡化有关。

sentences.english: Young anthers are composed of a protoderm and a central cell mass in early July.
sentences.chinese: 七月上旬，幼花药，由原始表层和中央细胞团组成。

sentences.english: Methods of monitoring moisture of upper soil layer with NOAA-11 data are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了用极轨气象卫星资料监测表层土壤湿度的方法。

sentences.english: Empathy. You know the subject's surface emotions.
sentences.chinese: 你得知受术者的表层情绪。

sentences.english: “The closer an earthquake is to the epicenter — the surface, where people are — the more dangerous it is,” Cantavella explained.
sentences.chinese: 坎塔韦拉解释说，地震越接近地球表层，就越危险。

sentences.english: The first and second scrim layers constitute exposed surfaces of the composite laminate.
sentences.chinese: 上下两层薄亚麻仍作为复合材料片层的表层裸露在外。

sentences.english: The surface material consists of drift.
sentences.chinese: 表层介质是冰碛组成的。

sentences.english: Epi-Fissure-Karst Zone(EFKZ)is commonly observed in karst mountainous area at the middle latitude of P.
sentences.chinese: 表层裂隙岩溶带广泛分布于我国中纬度岩溶地区。

sentences.english: The surface of literary tradition is literary purport, but its bottom is political consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 文学传统的表层是文学旨趣，但其深层是政治意识。

sentences.english: Remote sensing information is the synthetical reflection of the earth surface with definite scale space.
sentences.chinese: 遥感信息主要反映的是地球表层信息。
